schools.name: Mount Pulaski Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Mount Pulaski Elementary School, a public school located in Mount Pulaski, IL, serves grades PK-8 in the Mt Pulaski Community Unit School District 23.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Mt Pulaski Community Unit School District 23
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Mount Pulaski High School
schools.school-summary: Mount Pulaski High School, a public school located in Mount Pulaski, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Mt Pulaski Community Unit School District 23.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
